page.title: 16 MARTOCK INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content:
D.T.COMMERCIALS The founder of D.T.Commercials was{Mr {David Turner}.The firm started in 1975.They open at 7a.m. and close at 6p.m.They sell lorries,hire out lorries,repair lorries and sell spare _ parts.Mr Turner enjoys his work and he gets on with the ten workers he employs.
BANCOMBE ENGINEERING {Bancombe Engineering}started seven years ago and the building they are in now is five years old.The two buildings cover 5177 square feet.They open at 8:30a.m. and close at 5:30p.m.They are roofing contractors and use imported materials like hilti from Switzerland and fibreglass from France. Justin Cregan.
